timeline.bodyText: We probably need to restore interruption flag Thread.interrupt().
timeline.author: AHeise

replies.bodyText: Interruption is internal to SourceStreamTask, so I think the flag shouldn't be set.
replies.author: rkhachatryan

timeline.message:
[FLINK-15811][task] report CancelTaskException on SourceStreamTask cancellation

Thread interruption and InterruptedException are implementation details
and shouldn't be exposed. Throw CancelTaskException instead which is a part of informal contract.
